name: MPNowPlayingInfoCenter
desc: An object that you use to set now-playing information for media being played by your app.

items.name: class func `default`() -> MPNowPlayingInfoCenter
items.desc: Returns the singleton now playing info center.

items.name: var nowPlayingInfo: [String : Any]?
items.desc: The current now-playing information for the default now playing info center.

items.name: enum MPNowPlayingInfoMediaType
items.desc: The type of media currently playing.

items.name: var playbackState: MPNowPlayingPlaybackState
items.desc: The current playback state of the app.

items.name: enum MPNowPlayingPlaybackState
items.desc: The states of the app.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoCollectionIdentifier: String
items.desc: The identifier of the collection the now playing item belongs to.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyAvailableLanguageOptions: String
items.desc: The available language option groups for the now playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyAssetURL: String
items.desc: The URL pointing to the now playing item's underlying asset.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyChapterCount: String
items.desc: The total number of chapters in the now-playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyChapterNumber: String
items.desc: The number corresponding to the chapter currently being played.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyCurrentLanguageOptions: String
items.desc: The currently active language options for the now playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyDefaultPlaybackRate: String
items.desc: The default playback rate for the now playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyCurrentPlaybackDate: String
items.desc: The date associated with the current elapsed playback time.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyElapsedPlaybackTime: String
items.desc: The elapsed time of the now playing item, in seconds.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyExternalContentIdentifier: String
items.desc: The opaque identifier that uniquely identifies the now playing item, even through app relaunches.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyExternalUserProfileIdentifier: String
items.desc: The opaque identifier that uniquely identifies the profile the now playing item is played from, even through app relaunches.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyIsLiveStream: String
items.desc: Denotes whether the now playing item is a live stream.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyMediaType: String
items.desc: The media type of the now playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyPlaybackProgress: String
items.desc: The current progress of the now playing item.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyPlaybackQueueCount: String
items.desc: The total number of items in the app’s playback queue.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyPlaybackQueueIndex: String
items.desc: The index of the now-playing item in the app’s playback queue.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyPlaybackRate: String
items.desc: The playback rate of the now-playing item, with a value of 1.0 indicating the normal playback rate.

items.name: let MPNowPlayingInfoPropertyServiceIdentifier: String
items.desc: The service provider associated with the now-playing item.
